name: Beat Polarity
description:
Pitch :

An endless runner that glows! Swipe the screen to move the player left and right to avoid the squares of opposite color.

Game made for the Global Game Jam 2022.

Controls : 

Left click held and swipe to move to one side to another if you are on PC.

Swipe to move to one side to another if you are on Smartphone.

Creators :

Game Designers : Romain de Leuze - Gaëtan Perré

Game Programmers : Antoine Dirion - Arthur Pejoiane

Game Artists : Morigan Letourneau

Sound Designer : Mathis Merolla
